items.sentence: Tom locked himself in his room and wouldn\'t let anyone in.
Are you seriously thinking about changing your name to Tom?
As soon as Tom heard the gunshots, he ran out of the house.
Tom promised Mary that he\'d be more careful in the future.
I have a feeling that Tom doesn\'t like Mary all that much.
I heard a strange noise coming from Tom\'s room last night.
How many hours did you spend helping Tom with his homework?
Tom has been teaching Mary\'s children how to speak French.
Even Tom wouldn\'t be stupid enough to ask Mary to do that.
The police have uncovered new evidence related to the case.
